Cancer Patient Encouragement – Unshakable Faith Card

Hot Review! Cancer Patient Encouragement – Unshakable Faith Card – Get Well Cards Cancer Patient Encouragement – Unshakable Faith Card Have a promotion during this period Cancer Patient Encouragement – Unshakable Faith Card Try to read more firstEncourage someone showing remarkable faith in their fight against cancer with this unique calligraphy style typography design, with message "Unshakeable Faith. It’s undeniably yours. Design is accented with colorful flowers on bottom border. Inside has this message but can be customized to fit your personal needs: "Thinking of you today and all you are facing. You didn’t choose this and it’s definitely not fair. But because of who you are, you are facing it all with courage, bravery, determination, and unwavering faith. I admire you, and believe God will reward your faith with comfort, peace, and victory. Price:$4.12
